class_notes: Fourier series and integrals and their applications; includes a review of first-year calculus, including a review of integrals and series, and an extension to functions of complex numbers. Â The only course in the mathematics curriculum that teaches Fourier analysis. Also a good choice for students with AP BC credit who would like a stronger background in power series and integration.
course_description: Rotating topics in math. May be repeated for credit when the topic varies. Prerequisites and co requisites depend on the topic offered.
